data.name: AuthorsAllowedToIndicateDesiredReviewers
data.value: The website indicates if authors have a say in suggesting names of (non-)desired reviewers

data.name: CopiesAreMadeInThirdPartyRepositories
data.value: The journal (publisher) makes copies of published articles available in trusted third-party repositories (e.g. PubMed Central) immediately upon publication

data.name: DisclosesNumberOfSubmissionsPublicationsAndRejectionRates
data.value: The journal discloses the past (yearly) number of submissions, publications, and rejection rates

data.name: GoodValueForMoney
data.value: I would deem this journal good value for money

data.name: HasClearGuidelinesConcerningSharing
data.value: The journal (publisher) has clear guidelines concerning sharing and availability of data for verification purposes

data.name: HighlightsIssuesOfPublicationEthics
data.value: Journal’s website highlights issues of publication ethics (e.g. plagiarism, retraction policy), conflicts of interest, and (if applicable) codes of conduct for research in life sciences and social sciences

data.name: PeerReviewProcessTransparent
data.value: I would consider the peer-review process in this journal to be transparent

data.name: ProvidesArticlesWithDigitalObjectIdentifier
data.value: The journal (publisher) provides the articles with a Digital Object Identifier

data.name: ProvidesTrackAndTraceService
data.value: The website provides a track & trace service enabling authors to follow the status of their submission (e.g. under review)

data.name: PublishedPapersIncludeInformationOnDatesOfSubmissionAndAcceptance
data.value: Published papers include information on dates of original submission and acceptance

data.name: RecommendScholarsToSubmit
data.value: I would recommend scholars to submit their work to this journal

data.name: ReviewsCommentsArePublished
data.value: The website of the journal indicates how open editorial correspondence and reviewer's comments are

data.name: TakesCareOfInclusionInRelevantIndexingServices
data.value: The journal (publisher) takes care of inclusion of its articles in relevant indexing services

data.name: WebsiteAllowsRatingsAndCommentariesOfPapers
data.value: The journal website allows ratings of papers and post-publication commentaries by the community

data.name: WebsiteContainsAimsScopeAndReadership
data.value: Aims, scope, and target audience of the journal are clearly specified on the journal’s website

data.name: WebsiteContainsCriteriaUsedByReviewers
data.value: Criteria used by reviewers to rate submissions are specified on the website

data.name: WebsiteContainsNameAndAffiliationsOfMembersEditorialBoard
data.value: The names and affiliations of members of the editorial board are listed on the website

data.name: WebsiteContainsRoleOfMembersEditorialBoard
data.value: The role of members of the editorial board is explicated on the website including who will make final decisions about article acceptance (e.g., editor, associate/action editor)

data.name: WebsiteContainsSubmissionsReviewDetails
data.value: The website indicates whether all submissions are sent out for review
